faq.question: How do i enable tag completion?

answer.p: Tag completion is planned for the second release which will be called XPontus 1.0.1.
I didn't find a nice and free alternative to edit XML files at the time.

faq.question: Is there a Mac OS X installer?
How do i download the code from cvs?

answer.p: Use a CVS client like WinCVS which is crossplatform.
